hadiths.text: Yazid b. Abu Habib reported:'Ata' reported to me that he heard Jabir (b. 'Abdullah) saying it that he had heard that from Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) in the Year of Victory

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ بَيْعِ الْخَمْرِ وَالْمَيْتَةِ وَالْخِنْزِيرِ وَالأَصْنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of selling wine, dead meat, pork and idols
